description:
Thanks to NordVPN for sponsoring this video!

Netflix isn’t the only one with a 3 Body Problem! It may be one of their global top trending series, but Netflix wasn’t the first to make an adaptation, or the second, or even the third! So who is behind the OG version?
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee
Editor: Daniel Zemke
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman 
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐

title: Minecraft BEAT Netflix 👊! (3 Body Problem) #shorts
